General.Name: Basanite Inc
General.Description: Basanite, Inc. engages in the basalt fiber reinforced polymer (FRP) business worldwide. It produces basalt FRP products that are used as replacement for other FRP rebar and industry fiber products, as wells as steel reinforcement. The company was formerly known as PayMeOn, Inc. and changed its name to Basanite, Inc. in December 2018. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Pompano Beach, Florida.
General.Address: 2041 NW 15th Avenue, Oakland Park, FL, United States, 33069
